response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "medium", "At 20 years old, the individual is considered young and may have a higher propensity for risk-taking behavior, though youth alone is not determinative."],
    ["Race", "low", "Being Asian / Pacific Islander does not inherently contribute to risk factors for recidivism."],
    ["Criminal History", "high", "Having 3 arrests and a conviction history strongly correlates with a higher risk of recidivism."],
    ["Physical Attributes", "low", "Although overweight, physical characteristics are not strong predictors of criminal recidivism."],
    ["Marital Status and Living Situation", "low", "Being married is generally seen as a stabilizing factor; living alone may slightly reduce immediate familial pressures."],
    ["Education", "high", "Lacking a high school diploma or GED is linked with reduced socioeconomic opportunities and increased risk of reoffending."],
    ["Employment Stability", "medium", "Holding only 2 jobs in the past year may indicate some employment instability, which can be a risk factor."],
    ["Substance Use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a protective indicator regarding recidivism."],
    ["Mental Health", "medium", "Experiencing periods of feeling down could indicate underlying mental health issues that may affect behavior."],
    ["Early Family Environment", "medium", "Growing up in a large household (size 11) may have exposed him to chaotic environments, potentially influencing behavior."],
    ["Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief in a higher power can be a protective factor as it may encourage adherence to social norms."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: At 20 years old, the individual is considered young and may have a higher propensity for risk-taking behavior, though youth alone is not determinative.
Being Asian / Pacific Islander does not inherently contribute to risk factors for recidivism.
Having 3 arrests and a conviction history strongly correlates with a higher risk of recidivism.
Although overweight, physical characteristics are not strong predictors of criminal recidivism.
Being married is generally seen as a stabilizing factor; living alone may slightly reduce immediate familial pressures.
Lacking a high school diploma or GED is linked with reduced socioeconomic opportunities and increased risk of reoffending.
Holding only 2 jobs in the past year may indicate some employment instability, which can be a risk factor.
No drug use in the past four years is a protective indicator regarding recidivism.
Experiencing periods of feeling down could indicate underlying mental health issues that may affect behavior.
Growing up in a large household (size 11) may have exposed him to chaotic environments, potentially influencing behavior.
Belief in a higher power can be a protective factor as it may encourage adherence to social norms.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as Asian / Pacific Islander. He has been arrested 3 times and has been convicted. He is 5 feet 7 inches and weighs 230 lbs. He is married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and some of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived in a household of size 11. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
